#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   long cost,repair,sell,result;

   while(scanf("%ld",&cost)!=EOF)
   {

     cin>>repair>>sell;

     result=cost+repair-sell;

     if(result<0) cout<<"PROFIT\n";

     else cout<<"LOSS\n";

     cout<<endl;

   }

   return 0;

}
